Author: JohnnyC#2488
Content:
Is anyone interested in working on a games project? I have a mostly finished game in C# and was looking for either a UI/UX person, or someone that could help finish the game. I sunk some money into dev, artwork, etc but never finished it off - if you are ok working for game ownership % that would be sick. I have a partner that's got 12 years of dev but no game dev experience, and I'm more on the business strategy/marketing side of things.

If you want to connect, feel free to shoot me a PM!

Author: D2D privacyalternatives.com#5667
Content:
-----
I started adding some products/articles for a new Shop on my website and I'm using affiliates (referral links) at the moment. They are ITP (Intelligent Tracking Protection) compliant, so they use only first party cookies (not the third party cookies that follow you around showing you the same ads everywhere).

 But I would prefer to sell my own products, also because the profits on referrals are very low, especially for a niche site on privacy. So if there are any logos/designs from the Komodo ecosystem that I can use to design some t-shirts etc please let me know. I found some affiliates for Hush clothing, Monero, Grin, Zcash...but the ones I found for Komodo are still using the old logo

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: @D2D privacyalternatives.com  there's a link at the bottom of https://komodoplatform.com/ `Download Logo Pack` which has the latest.

Author: D2D privacyalternatives.com#5667
Content: @smk762 -  dracocanis ominator Thanks : ) And it's ok to use them to design/sell t-shirts etc?

Author: Audo#5667
Content: yes, Komodo is an open source project any anyone can use the logo to print t-shirts / coffee bugs, etc.

Author: D2D privacyalternatives.com#5667
Content: OK thanks : )

Author: D2D privacyalternatives.com#5667
Content:
Yes GAS is a problem I know, but Ethereum have the infrastructure to do it easily with Metamask and other tools and wallets available. I registered with the composer and the complete price was more than $8k. Not saying it's an unfair price , you get a lot for that amount,  being on AtomicDEX, having the security of dPoW etc, but I can't spend that amount at the moment. 

I also want to research what I would need to do for anything  related to regulations/compliance if:

1) I create a coin and then put it on any exchanges

2) If I integrate an exchange like Sideshift (and even AtomicDEX I think offer integrations).

Planning to move to a crypto friendly country very soon, probably Georgia, to make this possible
